text: Karl Wilhelm von Nägeli (27 March 1817 – 11 May 1891) was a Swiss botanist. He studied cell division, but became known as the man who discouraged Gregor Mendel from further work on genetics.Mawer, Simon 2006. Gregor Mendel: planting the seeds of genetics. p81 == References == Category:Swiss botanists Category:Cell biologists Category:1817 births Category:1891 deaths Category:Swiss scientists Category:People from the canton of Zürich
title: Karl Wilhelm von Nägeli
